item.title: Granular ISLE Customization: Installing the DG Theme
item.description: Granular ISLE Customization This post is part of a series describing Digital.Grinnell customizations to ISLE, in a “granular” format… one small customization at a time. An index of all documents in this series is included at the end of Granular ISLE Customization: Series Guidelines. Goal Statement In this “granular” post we will install Digital.Grinnell’s custom-built theme, namely digital_grinnell_bootstrap. The experience documented here involves an existing ISLE instance created using Building ISLE 1.
